name: Howling Casket
description: A combat machine developed by the Intelligentsia Guild, utilizing borisin biological tissues. These machines possess the tenacious vitality of long-life species and the "Slaughter Algorithm" evolved over countless ages.

skills.name: Bionic Claws
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Thunderous Roar
skills.description: Deals minor Physical DMG to a single target and units adjacent to the target.

skills.name: Lupitoxin Synthesis
skills.description: Deals minor Physical DMG to all targets, with a high chance of inflicting "<u>Terror Grip</u>" on all allies.

skills.name: Slaughter Algorithm
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to a single target and adjacent units. When the target enters the "<u>Terror Grip</u>" or "<u>Terrified</u>" state, additionally deals DMG.

skills.name: Borisin Instinct
skills.description:
When entering battle, decreases the number of "<u>Bloodlust</u>" stacks needed to enter "<u>Moon Rage</u>." After a friendly unit launches an attack, applies 1 stack of "<u>Bloodlust</u>" to <u>friendly units who can enter the "Moon Rage" effect</u>. When "<u>Bloodlust</u>" reaches a certain number of stacks, the friendly unit enters the "<u>Moon Rage</u>" state.
A "Moon Rage" countdown icon appears in the Action Order. When the countdown's turn begins, "<u>Moon Rage</u>" is dispelled for all friendly units.
